mapper.select:
select * from xhgmnet_talkgroup where 1=1
and talkgroupid like concat('%',#{talkgroupid},'%')
and E_name like concat('%',#{eName},'%')
order by id asc limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(*) from xhgmnet_talkgroup where 1=1
and talkgroupid like concat('%',#{talkgroupid},'%')
and E_name like concat('%',#{eName},'%')
